I am a general purpose chatbot. My capabilities are : 
 1. I can chat with you. Try asking me for jokes or riddles! 
 2. Ask me the date and time 
 3. I can google search for you. Use format google: your query 
 4. I can get the present weather for any city. Use format weather: city name 
 5. I can get you the top 10 trending news in India. Use keywords 'Latest News' 
 6. I can get you the top 10 trending songs globally. Type 'songs' 
 7. I can set a timer for you. Enter 'set a timer: minutes to timer' 
 8. I can get the present Covid stats for any country. Use 'covid 19: world' or 'covid 19: country name' 
 For suggestions to help me improve, send an email to ted.thedlbot.suggestions@gmail.com . Thank you!!

What are the latest fashion trends for women?
What are the best clothes for a workout
responses: I'm a language model, so I don't have personal preferences. But I can tell you that some popular clothing brands are Nike, Adidas, and H&M.
I am not capable of wearing clothes, but I can tell you that streetwear and athleisure are currently trending fashion styles.
Fashion trends change frequently, but currently, oversized and sustainable clothing are popular.

It depends on what you're looking for and your budget. High-end retailers like Neiman Marcus and Saks Fifth Avenue offer designer clothing, while fast fashion stores like Zara and H&M have more affordable options.
For a job interview, it's best to dress professionally. Men should wear a suit and tie, while women should wear a blazer or professional dress. Avoid anything too revealing or casual.
For men, some current fashion trends include bold prints, relaxed tailoring and streetwear-inspired looks.
For women, some current fashion trends include oversized and relaxed shapes, earthy and neutral colors, and vintage-inspired looks.
For a workout, it's best to wear clothes that are comfortable and allow for a full range of motion. Look for moisture-wicking fabrics, and consider clothes that are not too tight or restrictive.

patterns: Can you tell me a story?

What's a good story for adults?

What's a good story about adventure?
Can you tell me a story about friendship?
responses: Once upon a time, in a far-off kingdom, there lived a kind and brave prince. He had many suitors, but none of them caught his eye until one day, a beautiful and mysterious woman came to the kingdom. She was actually a wicked witch, but the prince fell in love with her. She used his love to get him to do her bidding, but in the end, the prince saw through her disguise and saved the kingdom. The end.

Once upon a time, in a magical forest, there lived a young bear named Teddy. Teddy was very curious and loved to explore the forest. One day, while exploring, he met a wise old owl who told him the importance of being brave and never giving up. From that day on, Teddy's adventures became much more exciting and he was able to overcome his fears and help his friends. The end.

Once upon a time, there was a powerful and wealthy businessman named John. John had everything he could want, but he felt empty inside. One day, he met a wise old sage who told him that true happiness comes from helping others. John began to volunteer and donate to charity, and he found that he was finally content. The end.

Once upon a time, in a small village, there lived a family who moved into an old and eerie mansion. They soon began to experience strange and terrifying occurrences. It turns out that the mansion was haunted by the ghosts of the previous owners who had been murdered by an unknown killer. The family was able to uncover the truth and put the ghosts to rest, but the experience left them forever changed. The end.

Once upon a time, in a land of dragons and unicorns, there lived a young orphan named Jack. He had always dreamed of becoming a powerful wizard, but had no idea how to achieve it. One day, he met a wise old wizard who took him under his wing and taught him the secrets of magic. Together, they battled evil sorcerers and monsters, and Jack finally realized his dream of becoming a powerful wizard. The end.

Once upon a time, there was a young woman named Mary, who fell in love with a man named Tom. They had a whirlwind romance and quickly decided to get married. However, their families did not approve of the match, and they were forced to run away together. They had many adventures and narrowly escaped danger many times, but they were always there for each other. In the end, they proved to their families that their love was true and they lived happily ever after. The end.

Once upon a time, there was a group of friends named Jim, Bob, and Sarah. They had always dreamed of going on a great adventure together. One day, they set out on a journey to find a legendary treasure. They had to face many obstacles, such as treacherous mountains, dark forests and fierce monsters, but they never gave up. In the end, they found the treasure, but realized that the true reward was the bond of friendship that they had formed along the way. The end.

Once upon a time, there was a young boy named Timmy who was very lonely. He had no friends and spent most of his time reading books. One day, he discovered a magical land inside one of his books. He met many strange and wonderful creatures there, but the most important one was a dragon named Harry. Harry and Timmy became the best of friends and had many adventures together. When Timmy had to return to the real world, he was heartbroken, but he knew that Harry would always be a part of him. The end.

patterns: I'm feeling sick, what should I do?
I think I have a cold, what can I do to feel better?
I have a fever, what should I do?
I have a headache, what can I take for it?
I have a stomachache, what can I do to feel better?
I have the flu, how can I recover?
I think I have a sinus infection, what should I do?
I have a sore throat, what can I do to relieve the pain?
I have a cough, is there anything I can do to stop it?
I have a rash, what could it be and what should I do?
I have diarrhea, what can I do to stop it?
I have a runny nose, what can I do to relieve the symptoms?
responses: If you're feeling sick, it's important to rest and stay hydrated. You can also take over-the-counter medications like ibuprofen or acetaminophen to reduce fever and relieve aches and pains. If your symptoms are severe or persistent, it's best to see a doctor.

If you think you have a cold, there's not much you can do to cure it, but you can relieve your symptoms by getting plenty of rest, drinking fluids, and taking over-the-counter medications like ibuprofen or acetaminophen. If your symptoms worsen or persist, see a doctor.

If you have a fever, it's important to stay hydrated and rest. You can also take over-the-counter medications like ibuprofen or acetaminophen to help lower your fever. If your fever is high or lasts for an extended period of time, it's best to see a doctor.

If you have a headache, you can take over-the-counter pain relievers like ibuprofen or acetaminophen. Drinking water, getting rest, and avoiding triggers like stress or certain foods can also help. If your headaches are severe or frequent, it's best to see a doctor.

If you have a stomachache, you can try drinking water and avoiding foods that are known to cause stomach upset. Over-the-counter antacids can also help relieve symptoms. If your stomachache is severe or persistent, it's best to see a doctor.

If you have the flu, it's important to rest and stay hydrated. Over-the-counter pain relievers like ibuprofen or acetaminophen can help reduce fever and relieve aches and pains. It's also important to practice good hygiene to prevent the spread of the flu. If your symptoms are severe or persistent, it's best to see a doctor.

If you think you have a sinus infection, it's best to see a doctor. Antibiotics may be prescribed if it is a bacterial infection. In the meantime, you can use saline nasal sprays and decongestants to relieve symptoms. Drinking plenty of fluids and using a humidifier can also help.

If you have a sore throat, it may be caused by a viral or bacterial infection. Over-the-counter pain relievers like ibuprofen or acetaminophen can help alleviate pain. Drinking warm liquids and using throat lozenges can also help. If your sore throat is severe or persistent, it's best to see a doctor.

If you have a cough, it may be caused by a cold, the flu, or other respiratory infection. Over-the-counter cough syrups can help relieve symptoms. Drinking fluids and avoiding irritants like smoke can also help. If your cough is severe or persistent, it's best to see a doctor.

If you have a rash, it could be caused by a variety of things such as an allergic reaction or an infection. It's best to see a doctor to determine the cause and appropriate treatment. In the meantime, you can use over-the-counter creams or ointments to help alleviate symptoms.

If you have diarrhea, it may be caused by a viral or bacterial infection. It's important to stay hydrated by drinking plenty of fluids. Over-the-counter anti-diarrheal medication can also help. If your diarrhea is severe or persistent, it's best to see a doctor.

If you have a runny nose, it may be caused by a cold, the flu, or other respiratory infection. Over-the-counter decongestants and nasal sprays can help relieve symptoms. Drinking fluids and using a humidifier can also help. If your symptoms are severe or persistent, it's best to see a doctor.
